post.body: maybe they like friend chicken and greens...
Thank you.. Discovery Sound is a good guy..just want to share some of his productions.
thank you. I am glad it is likable even though I don't know what they are saying...sounds good though
Hi George. Nice to see you here. Your movies inspired me and they inspire my son today. BTW, I liked Howard the Duck....lol
that quote got me a lot of PR back in the day..lol
I want to keep it low key if possible. I don't even know if my contract allows me to be on here..lol
tell you what.you always give a lot of links that I don't need, but if you can get your hands on some huaraches I forgive ya
all the credit goes to Jr. for getting signed up. It is kinda fun though.
No dear I don't think I will be attending...
Nice to see I am not alone in this crazy cyberland
I can't remember you 100%, but I do indeed have my cc ball.
Thanks for the comment. Of course my favorite has to be Super Bowl XXIII...
It would of been fun to play with Joe again...
It's still to early to tell, but if Team Spirit will be a factor I think the Titans are setting standards in that regard
I am talking about my version. Nike Cross Trainer Huarache 1992 Dark Green...
Thank you for your kind comments. I always believe do good things for others and good things will come back to you.
Sorry for the typo
My boys over in Japan just sent me their live rehearsal feed.. This is my fist link.. http://www.ustream.tv/channel/discoverystudio
Thanks to TG and BHA for the nomination. You can actually do these kinds of things on Twitter? LOL
I think the WWW has more photos of me than I do. Where do they find these photos...I am not talking about game days either....
This Twitter thing is crazy. I don't know what I am doing anymore....lol
Thanks to everyone who has followed in the last couple days. I follow back to start, but once the ads start coming I might think twice. TNX
I check everyone of my followers..I usually ad everyone, but yesterday had a bunch links for shoes. Now you know I don't need shoes..lol
I really want to read the updates, but can't be hassled with updates of ads. Please don't take it personnel if I haven't followed back.TBC
producers out there you might find some new ammo for your music arsenal. My site will be back up just after the first week of 2009.
Happy New Year all. Going to be changing my website link for a week to show support for homeboys in Japan Discovery Sound. 4 all U....
Probably be my last tweet of the year so just wanted to wish all of you a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.
To all my recent followers thank you. I try to follow everyone back but sometimes they don't let me..go figure..lol
I am going to try to reply to my @ replies when I get time. I do read what you write though...
All of you are awesome. I wish I was on here more. It is getting so big I don't know what to do...lol thanks all for following tbc
Thank all of you for your recent follows. I am actually getting used to this Twitter thing..
